naslov: Prodaja, luksuzna kuća, Zagreb, Podsljeme, Šestine, 310 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Namještena luksuzna 5-sobna kuća ( 310 m2 ) na tri etaže, Šestine. Građena na parceli od 1300 m2 s uređenim vrtom s automatskim navodnjavanjem i vanjskim grijanim bazenom ( 8 x 4 m ) . SUTEREN ( 89 m2 ); namješten studio apartman, kotlovnica za toplinsku pumpu i bazen. PRIZEMLJE ( 124 m2 ); ulazni prostor, dnevni boravak s izlazom na terasu ( 12 m2 ), blagovaonica, kuhinja, garderoba, toalet. KAT ( 96 m2 ); hodnik,  četiri spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, garderoba. Kuća ima protuprovalna vrata, alarm, video portafon, klima uređaj u svakoj prostoriji, električne rolete, kamin, hrastov parket, centralni usisivač, omekšivač vode. Grijanje je plinsko, preko dizalice topline i podno grijanje. Kući pripada više parkirnih mjesta, dva natkrivena. Nalazi se u Podsljemenskoj zoni s pogledom na okolne brežuljke, udaljena desetak minuta vožnje autom do centra grada. Agencijska provizija za kupca: 2% od postignute cijene ( oslobođena PDV-a ). U skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti osobnih podataka i zaštite vlasnika nekretnina od dolaska nepoznatih osoba, potencijalni kupci, najmoprimci i zakupnici će dobiti podatke o nekretnini tek nakon potpisivanja prezentacijskog lista ili ugovora o posredovanju. Za sva dodatna pitanja stojimo na raspolaganju putem emaila WhatsApp-a, Viber-a ili SMS-a. Furnished luxury 5-room house (310 m2) on three floors, Šestine. Built on a plot of 1300 m2 with a landscaped garden with automatic irrigation and an outdoor heated pool (8 x 4 m). BASEMENT (89 m2); furnished studio apartment, boiler room for heat pump and swimming pool. GROUND FLOOR (124 m2); entrance area, living room with exit to the terrace (12 m2), dining room, kitchen, wardrobe, toilet. FLOOR (96 m2); hallway, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, wardrobe. The house has security door, alarm, video intercom, air conditioning in every room, electric shutters, fireplace, oak parquet, central vacuum cleaner, water softener, gas heating, a heat pump and underfloor heating. The house has several parking spaces, two covered. Ten minutes by car from the city center. Agency commission for the buyer: 2% of the achieved price (no VAT). In accordance with the Law on the Protection of Personal Data, as well as the protection of real estate owners against the arrival of unknown persons, potential buyers, tenants will receive information about the real estate only after signing the presentation sheet or mediation agreement. For any additional questions, we are available via email, WhatsApp, Viber or SMS.
